content.question: Transit-oriented development in Southeast Asian cities is an innovative strategy to minimize crippling traffic jams. One aspect of transit-oriented development is the use of dedicated rapid-transit bus lanes to more efficiently connect residential neighborhoods with activity nodes. An added benefit of this strategy that would appeal to advocates of sustainable city-development programs is the

choices.label: increase in profits for bus operators

unit.text: 6: Cities and Urban Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain the significance of geographic similarities and differences among different locations and/or at different times.
